title: Tom Brady: Patriots Have Trump and Clinton Audible Calls
title_page: Tom Brady: Patriots Have Trump and Clinton Audible Calls | Breitbart
text:
During his weekly appearance on Boston radio show WEEI’s “Kirk and Callahan,” New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady was asked if he would use a Trump audible, like New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning may or may not have used in a game last week.
Brady first told Kirk and Callahan that the Patriots have a call similar to that [starting around the 9:23 mark].
Later, [around the the 16:48 mark], Brady says the Patriots also have a Clinton call.
“Trump and Clinton,” Brady said. “We’ve got two calls.”
Follow Trent Baker on Twitter @MagnifiTrent
